name: Bullet Sponge (Punkake92)
description:
The ball is your enemy, but the more you shoot it, the faster it gets... or does it? If you manage to figure the right angle, you might succeed in slowing it down. Comment with a screenshot if you manage to beat it... although I doubt you will!

Game made with Unity in 1 hour and a half for the Trijam#125, theme: One Enemy Only.

Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances in real life, I only used around 1 hour and a half of the three hours available; hence, the game lacks a couple game mechanics I wanted to implement, music and overall polish. Still decided to submit it, since the general concept is there. Hope you enjoy it!

For the aforementioned reason, I couldn't implement health bars: the player has 3 lives and the boss has an enormous, undisclosed amount of health. 

Controls

W, A, S, D - move

LMB - shoot

All the assets were made for this gamejam, except for SFX, which can be found here: https://joelsteudler.itch.io/sci-fi-sfx
